name: stacker-news-youtube-bot
description: A bot that monitors Stacker.News for YouTube links and posts yewtu.be alternatives

scripts.generate-keys: node -e "const { generatePrivateKey, getPublicKey } = require('nostr-tools'); const privKey = generatePrivateKey(); const pubKey = getPublicKey(privKey); console.log('Private Key:', privKey); console.log('Public Key:', pubKey);"
